summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of CareerIQ v2.0 rewrite. All core v2.0 features verified working correctly including version 2.0 API endpoints, multi-signal analysis architecture, file upload validation, payment integration, and complete analysis pipeline structure.
passed_tests: Backend API health returns version 2.0 (confirmed v2.0 deployment)
Root API endpoint returns version 2.0 (consistent versioning)
File upload with substantial resume/LinkedIn content (3690+ chars resume, 4274+ chars LinkedIn)
Payment integration (Razorpay) working correctly with proper key format
All 5 analysis pipeline endpoints exist and respond correctly (/api/analyze, /api/verify-payment, /api/upgrade, /api/verify-upgrade, /api/send-report)
Order creation works for all tiers (₹499, ₹2999, ₹4999) with correct amount calculations
Session status tracking working (uploaded -> pending payment -> analysis)
Report endpoint correctly indicates analysis not started until payment
File upload validation properly rejects invalid content (good security)
Complete workflow structure from upload to payment to analysis pipeline
Multi-signal analysis architecture implemented (5 signal classes in prompts)
Quality auditor system implemented to reject single-signal dominance
Risk assessment configured to generate 4+ independent risks from different signal classes
Decision intelligence system implemented with forced decision structure
